Articles.Content:
Currently had to start a new save because of the recent update deleting my previous save. I started a new save that I am quite proud of but I've come across a bug I have no answer to fixing. My contracts get wiped (archives, actives, and available.) It seems this problem only happens when I open up the tracker station and the map in general when I'm flying as well. I have no way to fix this currently and I've tried everything I can to find a way including googling this problem that happened on the PC. No luck so far, just need some help with this so I can go back to enjoying the game bug-free.

Edited October 1, 2016 by DoubleRMoney
